title: Broad daylight
creator_credit: British Information Services and Derrick Knight
brief_description: The development and use of patent glazing from Victorian times to the present day. Shows how patent glazing derived from the needs of expanding Victorian industry, and how it developed techniques so that today it remains completely adaptable to the demands of contemporary design.
